Articles.Content:
When the 3D-printed model of Valentina comes, which it surely must, will there be female versions of the other Kerbals? I know no female engineers and scientists (VAB/SPH) exist in-game yet, but they must surely exist! EVA Kerbal and Stargazing Kerbal at the very least!

I am not a fan of how female Kerbals seem to be being left out lately, Val is not in the gamer's edition, there are no female KSC staff in-game.

Until I have the money to get Bill and Bob as prints, I don't want to be forced to get another orange-suit to keep Gregoly (An EVA Kerbal) and Jebediah on IVA company.

It would also be cool to have the Administrators. We already have Linus in the form of Kerbal Intern and Gus in the form of Kerbal Mechanic. It'd be nice to have Mortimer and Walt as well. And maybe a few others such as Bobak Kerman.
